name: SANDRAL [LUDIC SKETCH]
description:
Explore a clockwork shrine and learn the untold histories of your ancestry. Use your family heirloom, a strange grappling device, to traverse the puzzling chambers of the temple, each room telling the story of a forebear, and discover what the foundations of your lineage were built on.

This ludic sketch of SANDRAL contains a small and early look at the world of SANDRAL, and some of its mechanics and puzzles in prototype form.

Developed as a Year 2 Falmouth University student project.

Game Design Document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XavVDW0bWGD5GZ2vsJFmj0mqYAyz3cnjliICUR49T70/...

Additional Asset References: https://docs.google.com/document/d/12x2gerwoE-UoE_T-hdZuD53Vno7BPP7R2s1pQx59Fqk/...
